subject: Television
Soccer
Soccer
Television
lead_paragraph: The Englishman Arlo White, who calls Premier League games for NBC’s audience in the United States, has had an ongoing love affair with his adopted country, one that began at a young age.
snippet: The Englishman Arlo White, who calls Premier League games for NBC’s audience in the United States, has had an ongoing love affair with his adopted country, one that began at a young age.
